name: jut
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to (cause to) stick out, especially above or past the edge or surface of something: The pier juts (out) into the lake. He jutted his chin/jaw (out) defiantly. Synonyms
project
protrude

Related word
jutting
Add to word list
Add to word list
to stick out, esp. above or beyond the edge or surface of something: A large ship was docked at the pier that jutted out into the harbor.
